overview: Australian band Mammal play one night at Brisbane's Waterloo Hotel in 2007 off the back of their first live album "Vol 1: The Aural Underground" and new single "Nagasaki In Flames". Filmed at the peak of their underground following, and a full year away from the release of their debut studio album. The set consists of songs from the EP, the live album as well as a few that were never saw an official release.  1. Nagasaki In Flames  2. Think  3. Sweat The Vest  4. Hollywood Shrine  5. Two Soles  6. Push & Shove  7. Groove Junkie  8. New Breed Judas  9. Burnout  10. Inciting  11. Hell Yeah  12. Maker
title: Mammal: Live At The Waterloo
